column4: Can anyone tell me how to fix my MBR or whatever so that grub will load without having the Ubuntu CD in?
If I try to boot without the cd in I get "Error Loading Operating System"
If I try with the Ubuntu disc in and choose "Boot from first Hard Disk" GRUB loads fine.
i'd try installing the boot loader somehow, I don't know how you install just the boot loader with out an alternative cd
